summary: Senior DevOps Engineer with deep hands-on experience designing secure, scalable AWS infrastructure using Terraform, GitHub Actions, and Go-based deployment patterns.

skills.Cloud Platforms: AWS, Azure, EC2, RDS, S3, Lambda, ECS, EKS, SSM, VPC, CloudWatch
skills.Infrastructure as Code: Terraform, CloudFormation, IaC modules, drift detection
skills.Containers & Orchestration: Kubernetes, Docker, EKS, ECS, Helm charts
skills.CI/CD: GitHub Actions, GitLab, Jenkins, automated deployment pipelines
skills.Automation: Python, Bash, PowerShell, config automation, environment provisioning
skills.Observability: CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, ELK, SLIs, SLOs, MTTR reduction
skills.Security & Compliance: IAM, KMS, Secrets Manager, access controls, hardening
skills.Networking: VPC design, routing, private subnets, load balancers, DNS, security groups
skills.DevOps Leadership: Environment modernization, best practices, reliability engineering

points: Designed and automated AWS infrastructure leveraging Terraform modules to modernize cloud environments and reduce provisioning time
Implemented GitHub Actions CI and CD pipelines enabling fully automated builds, tests, deployments, and environment promotion
Managed Kubernetes workloads on EKS including scaling, workloads, security controls, and release management
Enhanced system reliability with CloudWatch, Prometheus, and ELK improving visibility and reducing operational incidents
Partnered with engineering teams to drive DevOps best practices improving uptime, performance, and deployment frequency
Architected and supported Kubernetes infrastructure and microservices deployments using Terraform and GitOps automation
Improved CI and CD pipelines enabling consistent deployment automation and rollback workflows across multiple environments
Optimized AWS environments including VPC design, EKS clusters, load balancing, scaling, and system hardening
Built monitoring and alerting systems using Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK to ensure reliability and performance at scale
Automated infrastructure operations through Python and Bash improving developer productivity and reducing operational toil
Developed Terraform and Ansible automation to build, update, and maintain AWS and Azure environments at enterprise scale
Managed CI and CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub improving deployment reliability and reducing manual steps
Designed and supported container platforms using Kubernetes and Docker including cluster upgrades and workload security
Enhanced AWS networking with VPCs, subnets, route configuration, SGs, and firewall rules supporting distributed systems
Implemented IaC automation using Terraform and Ansible supporting adoption of AWS cloud environments
Built and enhanced CI and CD pipelines using Jenkins enabling automated deployments for internal applications
Managed IAM including Active Directory integration, identity lifecycle automation, and secure access control enforcement
Supported hybrid cloud operations improving reliability, capacity planning, and disaster recovery readiness
